title: Google\Cloud\Trace\Reporter\AsyncReporter
name: AsyncReporter
description: This implementation of the ReporterInterface use the BatchRunner to provide asynchronous reporting of Traces and their TraceSpans.

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Create a TraceReporter that utilizes background batching.

params.name: options.client
params.description: A trace client used to instantiate traces to be delivered to the batch queue.

params.name: options.debugOutput
params.description: Whether or not to output debug information. Defaults to false.

params.name: options.batchOptions
params.description: A set of options for a BatchJob. Google\Cloud\Core\Batch\BatchJob::__construct() for more details. Defaults to ['batchSize' => 1000, 'callPeriod' => 2.0, 'workerNum' => 2].

params.name: options.clientConfig
params.description: Configuration options for the Trace client used to handle processing of batch items. For valid options please see Google\Cloud\Trace\TraceClient::__construct().

params.name: options.batchRunner
params.description: A BatchRunner object. Mainly used for the tests to inject a mock. Defaults to a newly created BatchRunner.

params.name: options.identifier
params.description: An identifier for the batch job. Defaults to stackdriver-trace.

methods.name: report
methods.description: Report the provided Trace to a backend.
